titles.title: A bill to extend the Generalized System of Preferences, and for other purposes.
A bill to extend the Generalized System of Preferences, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: This bill extends through April 30, 2022, the duty-free treatment provided for certain items under the Generalized System of Preferences, and it extends to November 25, 2029, the date through which certain merchandise processing fees may be charged.
